item.description: software engineer @ BBC twitter: @djhworld code: github/djhworld irc/freenode: djhworld i have a linkedin but never look at it projects caniaffordtobuy.co.uk interests video games data engineering tinkering with raspberry pis personal finance fiction films with bill murray in them this website statically generated using hugo theme: heather-hugo (tweaked)
